name: Myrentacar WW
name_aliases: rentacarfor, ren tacarfor, rent a car for, rentacr, rent a car, localrent, локал, локалрент, рент, myrenta, myr, rent
description:
Localrent (ex.Myrentacar) affiliate campaign

Please note that at the moment on the side of Admitad there is no technical possibility of marking online advertisement and submitting data to the Online Advertising Register in the offer.

Localrent (ex.Myrentacar) – is international service for booking cars of local auto providers in Russia, Montenegro, Czech Republic and Georgia. It connects more than 150 local providers. The main slogan of the company is «Book certain car for the best price». 

Despite the small amount of country the company works in you can receive more profit (data of the advertiser, comparing to other "car rental services"). 

Advantages for customers:


	All car rental services of a city in one place
	The same prices as offered by auto providers
	Quick and polite support
	You choose a certain car (with color and type of audio system), but not only the car class
	Small amount to book a car (prepayment)
	Lower prices than global car rental services offer
	 


Target audience:


	Russia and CIS
	Demography: males 25-50 years old – 70%, females 27-45 years old – 30%.
	The target audience is modern and independent. They like to organize their trips by themselves. 
	Often a car can be booked by family with children for vacation time. If you work with Russia you need to know that many businessmen book cars in our service for business trips.


Join Localrent (ex.Myrentacar) affiliate program!

name: Economybookings Many GEO's
name_aliases: economybookings, rentalcars, ренталкарс, аренда авто, экономибукингс, 'rjyjvb,erbyuc
description:
Please note that at the moment on the side of Admitad there is no technical possibility of marking online advertisement and submitting data to the Online Advertising Register in the offer

Company Information:

Economybookings.com is one of the leaders in the field of online car booking in more than 150 countries worldwide.


	Economybookings.com has been operating in the online car booking industry since 2008. Currently, Economybookings.com occupies a leading position in Europe in the online car booking industry and offers a wide range of services in 150 countries.
	The company has at least three to four car rental providers in each city, ensuring a high level of customer service.


Portrait of the target audience - demography:

20-65 years old; people interested in traveling and planning it.

Benefits for webmasters:


	High rates (for this segment);
	A wide selection of cars in 150 countries worldwide – your user is sure to find what they need;
	The company focuses on finding cars at the lowest prices, which is beneficial for the user;
	User support via a call center.


Benefits for customers:


	We are with our clients throughout the booking process, during the rental process, and after the rental.
	Our clients can always feel secure, as all booking and rental-related questions are handled by experienced rental company specialists.
	We are the only company with a 24/7 support line.
	Our website is designed to provide clients with maximum information about their upcoming rental.
	We also have an active call center, so if you can't find the answer to your question on our homepage, you can call us to receive a response. Our operators are knowledgeable about all your questions.
	Thanks to our partnerships with hundreds of rental companies, leaders in both the global and local markets, Economybookings.com offers a wide selection of cars of all classes and finds the best deals for your trips.


TOP 10 destinations where our clients travel:


	USA Florida
	Italy
	Canada
	Australia
	Spain
	US California
	US Hawaii
	Portugal
	Greece
	United Kingdom


Negative keywords for contextual advertising:


	economybookings.com
	economybookings
	eavtoprokat.ru
	eavtoprokat
	avtoprokat.ru
	hertz
	avis
	europcar
	enterprise
	alamo
	national
	dollar
	thrifty
	sixt
	budget
	Contextual advertising is prohibited on the Russian market.


Rejection of orders / disconnection of a partner for:


	Brand bidding (but permitted for car rental company brands);
	doorway traffic;
	adult;
	cookie stuffing.


Additional information: 


	The program operates on a revenue share model, with the advertiser's commission transferred to the "Order Amount" field.
	Orders are confirmed only after the rental is completed (car is returned), as the number of days and order amount can be changed by the user during the rental period.


Join the Economybookings Many GEOs affiliate program!

Qeeq.com is a reliable online car rental platform.

We are QEEQ.COM, a trusted online car rental platform for travelers worldwide.

Our fast growth and increasing global recognition have been illustrated by a nomination for the World Travel Awards 2019, which was preceded by a Magellan Gold Award as well as a Travolution Award in 2018.

name: DiscoverCars WW
name_aliases: Discover cars, discovercars, DiscoverCars, Discover Cars
description:
DiscoverCars WW affiliate program

Please note that at the moment on the side of Admitad there is no technical possibility of marking online advertisement and submitting data to the Online Advertising Register in the offer.

Discovercars.com is an Award winning car rental comparison website (World Travel Awards, Financial Times 1000, Inc. 5000). Customers can find, compare and rent a car globally. We have over 1 million users traffic in the high season, a very high customer review on TrustPilot and already partner with some of the top webmasters in the travel vertical.

How much can you earn?
Websites with under 10,000 monthly traffic can expect to have 25 bookings per month and $700 USD earnings.
Websites with 10,001-50,000 monthly traffic can expect to have 70 bookings per month and $2,000 USD earnings.
Websites with over 50,001 monthly traffic can expect to have 100+ bookings per month and $3,000 USD earnings.

Who do we work with?
Travel Blogs, Online Travel Agencies, Accommodation sites, Mobile Apps, Travel Companies, Airports, Airlines.

Commission:
54% commission on each car rental reservation and additionally 23% commission on each car rental reservation’s additional product FullCoverage purchase (insurance type of a product). All commissions are paid from DiscoverCars.com earned commissions.
Cookies: 365 days.

Your commission example:
Average 7 days rental in Tenerife: 54% from 16.66 EUR booking + 23% from 44.52 EUR Full Coverage = 8.99 + 10.24 = 19.23 EUR Your commission

What has changed because of COVID-19

The pandemic has undoubtedly hit the travel industry hard resulting in numerous cancellations and a significant decline in bookings. At DiscoverCars.com, we follow the ongoing situation and adapt to the circumstances while being honest with both our customers and our partners. Despite the uncertainty of the situation, we remain financially stable and reliable, particularly when it comes to payments. Bookings have shifted to being made at the last minute by customers instead of trips being planned ahead of time. Our top-selling destinations have changed often due to the ever-changing landscape concerning lockdowns.

How long would I have to wait to get paid?

We pay our affiliates 60 days after the rental drop-off. This is the standard in the
industry.

Sales attribution
You earn commissions from every purchase users make whether on both the desktop and mobile versions of the website.

Confirmation process
The booking status is updated two days after the car is returned to the rental location.
! You only earn a commission if the customer physically appears to pick up the car and uses the service. !

Benefits of joining the affiliate program of DiscoverCars:


	Cookie lifetime 365 days
	Competitive pricing in over 10,000 locations worldwide
	Website is available in 17 languages
	High customer satisfaction rating: 4,4/5 on TrustPilot, 4,3/5 on Google, 4,2 on Review Center.


Awards (clickable):


	World Travel Awards
	Magellan Award
	Travel and Hospital Award
	Financial Times Top1000 - 2020
	Trustpilot Top 10
	Similarweb Top 50
	Uzrakota Global Travel Award
	Financial Times Top 1000 - 2021


Who are some of our partners (clickable):

Travel Bloggers:


	Annaeverywhere
	Expertvagabond
	Inafarawayland
	Wildjunket
	Alexzimin
	Ourescapeclause


Airlines: 


	Aircentury


Airports: 


	Liepaja-airport


Online Travel Agencies:


	Svyaznoy
	Carwix


 

Join DiscoverCars WW affiliate program!

name: Movida BR CPA
Альмак Прокат RU
name_aliases: Альмак Прокат, прокат машин, fkmvfr ghjrfn, almak prokat, фдьфл зкщлфе, аренда машин, автомобили
description:
Альмак Прокат – сервис аренды автомобилей в Санкт-Петербурге с 13-летним опытом работы. Наш автопарк насчитывает более 600 машин разных классов – от эконома до премиум. Мы предлагаем три основных продукта: краткосрочную аренду, долгосрочную аренду и аренду с правом выкупа.

 Цифры и факты:


	Более 69 000 клиентов за время работы
	33 000+ повторных обращений
	475 выдач автомобилей ежемесячно


Преимущества для клиентов:


	 Автомобили в отличном состоянии, проходят регулярное ТО.
	Все авто застрахованы по ОСАГО, доступна опция снижения ответственности до нуля.
	Поддержка 24/7 и подменный автомобиль в случае поломки.
	 Прозрачные условия: без скрытых платежей, всё фиксируется в договоре.
	 Аренда с выкупом: минимальный первоначальный взнос, возможность досрочного выкупа, налог и страховка включены в платежи.
	 Удобная доставка авто клиенту.


Целевая аудитория:


	Мужчины и женщины 23–45 лет, со стажем вождения от 2 лет.
	Частные лица, которым нужен автомобиль «здесь и сейчас» или альтернатива покупке в кредит.
	Малый и средний бизнес, которому нужен корпоративный транспорт без крупных вложений.


Популярные продукты:


	Краткосрочная аренда – от 1 дня, включено 200 км/сутки, доступно расширение до 300 или 500 км.
	Долгосрочная аренда – от 1 до 18 месяцев, включено 1500 км в месяц, расширение лимита до 6000 км за доплату.
	Аренда с правом выкупа – для физических и юридических лиц, срок от 12 до 42 месяцев. Минимальный первоначальный взнос, гибкий график платежей, возможность досрочного выкупа.


 

Рекомендации по позиционированию:


	Делайте акцент на надежности: «13 лет на рынке», «600+ авто», «30 000 клиентов вернулись».
	Подчёркивайте гибкость и простоту: «Авто без лишних документов», «Аренда с выкупом — альтернатива кредиту и лизингу».
	Используйте формулировки: «Прозрачные условия», «Автомобиль уже сегодня», «Клиенты возвращаются».


 

Факт продажи фиксируется по выезду клиента (средний срок сделки – 7 дней от заявки). Вознаграждение зачисляется за все позиции авто.
Востребованный продукт в B2C и B2B сегментах, высокая конверсия.
Поддержка рекламными материалами и баннерами.

name: America-carrental MX
description: America Car Rental ofrece servicios de arrendamiento de autos en México, desde vehículos económicos hasta SUVs y autos ejecutivos, con enfoque en comodidad, rapidez y confiabilidad. El objetivo de la campaña es incrementar reservas online, generando clientes nuevos y recurrentes mediante estrategias de marketing digital orientadas a performance. El público objetivo son adultos de 25 a 55 años que buscan rentar vehículos para viajes de negocio o placer y que valoran eficiencia y facilidad en la renta de autos. Los KPIs principales son número de reservas online, costo por reserva (CPA) y CTR y conversiones de campañas digitales. La campaña se ejecuta únicamente en web, utilizando banners y materiales de display orientados a performance, con seguimiento de resultados a través de Admitad (clicks, impresiones, ventas). No se requiere app ni integración SDK, y todos los enlaces y creatividades deben cumplir con los lineamientos de la marca. Se monitorea constantemente para optimizar performance y asegurar cumplimiento de KPIs.
